meanings.sent1: The minikin kitten fit perfectly in the palm of my hand.
meanings.sent2: She wore a minikin necklace that sparkled in the sunlight.
meanings.sent3: The minikin teacup danced on the edge of the table, almost too delicate to touch.
meanings.sent4: Her minikin footsteps barely made a sound on the soft carpet.
meanings.sent5: The minikin flower bloomed shyly among the larger blooms in the garden.

meanings.definition: A small, dainty person or thing
meanings.sent1: The tiny minikin bird chirped melodiously in the tree.
meanings.sent2: She was a minikin figure in the crowd, easily overlooked but full of grace.
meanings.sent3: The minikin squirrel scurried up the tree with a nut bigger than itself.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter tinkled like the bells on a minikin bracelet.
meanings.sent5: The minikin doll sat on the shelf, its delicate features captivating all who passed by.
